title: Mountain Trail
description: A breathtaking trail through the mountains with stunning views and rugged terrain.
route: Start from Hilltop Base, pass through Rocky Pass, and end at Summit Viewpoint.
story: This journey takes you through steep climbs, winding paths, and exhilarating descents, offering the best mountain biking experience.

title: City Ride
description: An exciting urban biking experience through bustling streets and scenic pathways.
route: Begin at Central Park, ride through Downtown Avenue, and finish at Riverside Walk.
story: Enjoy the city vibes while navigating through vibrant streets, experiencing local culture, and stopping at hidden caf√©s along the way.

title: Coastal Ride
description: A scenic ride along the coastline, feeling the breeze and admiring the ocean view.
route: Start from Sunrise Bay, follow the Ocean Drive, and reach Sunset Point.
story: The peaceful sound of waves accompanies you as you cycle along the shoreline, making it a perfect adventure for relaxation and exploration.

title: Forest Expedition
description: A thrilling ride through dense forests and rugged terrain, full of adventure.
route: Begin at Green Trailhead, ride through Wildwood Path, and end at Echo Lake.
story: Encounter hidden waterfalls, wildlife, and serene nature trails as you weave through the heart of the forest on this unforgettable journey.
